author: etan_status
content:
Updated https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6493
– Networking section to define how SSZ transactions / receipts are being exchanged on devp2p.
– `PooledTransaction` wrapper to fully allow transitioning blob transactions to SSZ, including the blobs payloads.
– `NewPooledTransactionHashes` backwards-compatible change to allow clients to filter SSZ transactions based on blobs being present.

author: etan_status
content:
Updated https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6404 and https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6466
– Both are now based on EIP-6493 `SignedTransaction` / `Receipt`

Updated https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6465
– Added typed withdrawal envelope to support exchange of SSZ `Withdrawal`; this is the same mechanism as defined in EIP-6493 / EIP-2718
– Reusing the consensus `Withdrawal` here instead of creating a `PartialContainer` wrapper, as this type doesn't seem to be as much in flux as transactions / receipts. But we could of course also decide to go the `PartialContainer` route here as well.

Updated https://eth-light.xyz
– There is now a list of all the SSZ EIPs on the landing page

That completes the spec work for now (pending polish / tests)! 
– All the EIPs are now updated to the latest `PartialContainer` approach.
– Networking specs have been included; this means, SSZ transactions are supported in the mempool as well, instead of solely being a post-block-inclusion representaiton.
– Live demo is available via https://eth-light.xyz for latest blocks; can also pass txhash via URL to inspect a specific Mainnet transaction
– Reviews welcome ❤️
